title: Small studio, 1 pkg included. Hardwd fls. kitchen and bath.
posting_body: ['Located on the 2nd floor in multi family.', 'This unit has a separate entrance, small kitchen and', 'bath.', ' Hardwood floors and a good size closet.', 'The main room is small, but can hold a full size', 'bed, a bureau, desk and chair.', ' Only 1 occupant is allowed.', 'No pets or smoking, laundry facilities in the building.', 'Tenant responsible for heat, hot water and electric.', 'Tenant must be employed and have a good credit', 'score.', 'Monthly income requirement', 'is approx.', '$3,000.', 'Available for 8/5 or 8/15.', 'There is a real estate fee of $950 if you rent this unit.', 'When responding, please tell me what you do for work,', 'your credit score, your move in date, cell number', 'and email address.', 'I will send you photos.', 'Thanks,', 'Marie', 'Monaco R.E.', 'Newton, MA']
